Html:
Hello.

Newest Gmap.net(ea1071d1c5db) failed to load GoogleKoreaSatelliteMap (GoogleKoreaHybridMap too) tiles.
I don't know why. Would you check this problem?

I've solved this problem. It caused by wrong UrlFormat value in GoogleKoreaSatelliteMapProvider.cs (line: 64)

Old: readonly string UrlFormat = "http://{0}{1}.{9}/{2}/v={3}&x={4}{5}&y={6}&z={7}&s={8}";
New: static readonly string UrlFormat = "http://{0}{1}.{10}/{2}/v={3}&hl={4}&x={5}{6}&y={7}&z={8}&s={9}";

Thanks for your great work, Radioman.
